sentences: Erinevad hinnangud, arvamused, seisukohad, veendumused, tõekspidamised.
Oskab kalatoite valmistada kümnel erineval viisil.
context: The Estonian adjective 'erinev' means different or distinct. It is used to describe things that are not the same as others, showing variety or divergence in characteristics, opinions, interpretations, methods, etc. The word follows Estonian adjective conjugation patterns with forms like erineva (genitive), erinevat (partitive), and comparative erinevam.
